alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:41AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Randall, southeastern Oldham, northeastern Deaf Smith and southwestern Potter Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Vega to near Umbarger. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Vega, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Buffalo Lake, Bushland, Dawn, Umbarger, Wildorado, Palo Duro Canyon and Timbercreek Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Deaf Smith; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall
